subhead: Two media outlets published body camera footage incriminating law enforcement during an intervention against opponents of a 'megabasin' in 2023. An internal investigation has been launched.

title: In 'Predator: Badlands,' even monsters suffer
subhead: The seventh installment in this franchise that began in 1987 thrusts the warrior beast onto a hostile planet where it must prove its bravery. Packed with references to science fiction films, this new entry boasts meticulously crafted action scenes.

subhead: Attracted by French universal health coverage, many Americans have chosen to settle in the country, where they are also exempt from paying income tax.

title: War in Ukraine: Battle for Pokrovsk enters final phase
subhead: Russian infantry are advancing inside the city, one of the last major urban centers in the Donetsk region still under Kyiv's control. Moscow's shift in tactics – focusing on destroying Ukrainian logistics – has paid off after six months.

title: 'There's almost no water left': On the front lines of climate change in southern France
subhead: 'Our planet at +1.5°C' (6/6). Persistent drought, record temperatures, wildfires: Faced with the most acute effects of global warming, residents of the Aude department in southern France are looking for ways to keep their region alive.
